question: Toilet (bait ul khala) adab/appropriatness, please see below.Jazakallah.
answer:
QUESTION
AA Mufti Saab. Is it permissible to say ?Inshallah, mashallah, astaghfiruallah? etc in your HEART while relieving onself, seated on a toilet seat??? I say the above as thoughts race through my head while on the toilet seat and as a habit I keep saying ?inshallah, mashallah? to things and ideas in my head. What should one do when you find yourself saying the above (in your heart)while relieving???? Is it permissible etc? Jazak Allah
ANSWER


Share:
It is prohibited to verbally make any form of zikr, in the toilet. If any
form of zikr involuntarily comes to the mind and heart, the person will not
be accountable for that.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
FATWA DEPT.
